name: enterprise-da-stack
label: Enterprise Deployable Architecture
short_description: A single solution with three variations: Base, Cognos, and App Connect.
long_description: This deployable architecture provides a choice of three pre-configured deployment patterns. You can deploy the foundational infrastructure by itself, or choose a variation that includes Cognos Analytics or App Connect Enterprise.

flavors.name: base
flavors.label: Base Infrastructure
flavors.short_description: Deploys the foundational VPC, networking, and security groups.

flavors.name: cognos
flavors.label: Base with Cognos Analytics
flavors.short_description: Deploys the base infrastructure plus a Cognos Analytics service.

flavors.name: appconnect
flavors.label: Base with App Connect
flavors.short_description: Deploys the base infrastructure plus an App Connect Enterprise service.
